entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump @narendramodi You're so full of crap. You can't even give our country the resources needed. #PPE is needed, I bet you don't know what that is. A vaccine will not be available for a long time so quit lying to us. #COVID19 will NEVER go away until after you're gone in NOV. #WhereAreTheTests
